The chess legend Bobby Fischer has been detained in Japan. In 1992 he violated international sanctions by playing a chess match there. 
 He has come to express very extremist point of views as well as anti-semetic views. 
 
 It is said he will be deported to the US.
 
 What should / will happen to him?

I think he's a bit of a nut. Sad, really. His mother was Jewish, which makes him Jewish, but he says the most insane paranoid things about Jewish people. He also has some issue with women.
Yes. I was shocked when I read what he stated. I guess he can technically say that but...MAN, REALLY, don't you think that's a WEEEE bit disrepectful?

I think he may be a bit off his rocker.
 
 I'd just like to see what he does after he probably pays some fine. Will he leave the US or stay here.
